```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(mosaic)
library(ggformula)
```

```{r}
bihs <- read.csv("bihs_final.csv")
bihs$year <- as.factor(bihs$year)
bihs <- bihs %>% na.omit()
glimpse(bihs)
str(bihs)
tally(bihs$hhhead_literate)
```
```{r}
mod <- lm(fcs ~ year + hhhead_gender + hhhead_literate + 
                     memb_total + memb_und15 + memb_15_44 + 
                     gender_parity_gap + 
                     asset_cartplough + asset_motorbike + asset_television + asset_radio + asset_telephone + asset_tractor +
                     asset_qty_poultry + asset_qty_cattle + asset_qty_otherlivestock + asset_qty_sheepgoat, data = bihs)
```
